content: try out this crochet baseball applique pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/fep5ydbnuqg skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -red and white -yarn needle -scissors -hair tie final size - 9 cm in diameter
